Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Gratitude \Grat"i*tude\, n. [F. gratitude, LL. gratitudo, from gratus agreeable, grateful. See {Grate}, a.] The state of being grateful; warm and friendly feeling toward a benefactor; kindness awakened by a favor received; thankfulness. [1913 Webster]
The debt immense of endless gratitude. --Milton. [1913 Webster]
gratitude n : a feeling of thankfulness and appreciation; "he was overwhelmed with gratitude for their help" [ant: {ingratitude}]
